title: LOVELY TENNESSEE HEIGHTS 2BR/1BA, ALL UTIL/WIFI INCL. Shorter term, OK
posting_body: Water, sewer, gas, electric, trash, wireless internet and cable included (a $300 value).
4- OR 9-month lease, through December or May, OR 1 year.
Exposed brick, recessed lights, washer/dryer, dishwasher, Central AC, eat-in kitchen, gas stove, and backyard.
Furnished with 2 beds (queen and full), couch, television, microwave, kitchen table, etc. Includes bedding and dishes.
Wash and dry your clothes in your unit for free.
In addition to a shower, bathroom has a tub.
Bike lane on the street in front of the house and 3 to 5 blocks to subways.

Walking distance to social gathering spots, grocery stores, coffee shops, a green dry cleaner, vegan eateries and international restaurants, 2 blocks to a gym, tennis courts, soccer fields, a trendy café open until midnight and 2.5 blocks to bicycle rentals!
TRULY in the heart of the city.
CONTACT BY PHONE anytime, not email,
